title: Sketchbook Folio, "Ecstasy of St. Theresa after Circle of Francesco Albani", 1810–20
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink at lower left: 26 Albano Forli
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Swooning Saint with book on ground before him; Saint supported by an angel and another figure (God the Father?) hovers above at right. Angels and cherubim on clouds above.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Ecstasy of St. Theresa after Circle of Francesco Albani", 1810–20.
1810–20. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash over traces of black chalk on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3496.
